description: It doesn't manage to follow the mouse. Like it wasn't receiving the MouseMove Events from X11.
summary: this snap didn't work for me

description: Version 2.3 used to be offered through the Ubuntu Budgie software store, which is much more stable and usable. Version 3.0 that is now available is not stable enough yet. I am sorely disappointed that no ability is offered to install the older version 2.3.
summary: SolveSpace 3.0 is not stable enough - do not use!

description: I did not experience any bugs in this 3.0 version, and I find it to be a wonderful,lightweight and fast 3D parametric modeler.

Current Focal install, but have had a few of these problems with CAD snaps - other package options seem to work well so for a far more stable install try the PPA run by Alex https://launchpad.net/~alex-p/+archive/ubuntu/solvespace
summary: Solvespace is great but this Snap doesnt work

description: It's not even close to the industry standard but it's fast, it does what it's supposed to do.
summary: It is actually one of the best drafting programs I've found

Does not work in Ubuntu21.04

summary: would be a great app if it works

description: Simple to use and very capable for what it is!
Any software can use further development. This works for me for now for 3DP modeling in Linux, and I appreciate it being available for use. Thank you!

Having read reviews for SolveSpace 3, and they were not good, so I installed version 2.3. It is available in the Software Centre but hard to find unless you just search for "solvespace" in which case you will find two versions - very confusing. Best to just install from the command line.

sudo apt-get install solvespace

This will install version 2.3. If you want to check first to make sure this is the version before installing, then:

apt-cache policy solvespace

will tell you what versions are available from the depository. Always better to use the command line in my opinion.
summary: Works better if you install version 2.3+repack1-3

description: It does not launch from the supplied icon
summary: It launches in terminal : sudo solvespace

description: I love this thing. The workflow is intuitive and fast. It has some limitations, and slows down quite a bit on complex models, but it's well worth using. It's 100 times better freecad just because of the ease of use.

Das Programm ist absolut empfehlenswert für mich um eine Konstruktion für mein Nebengebäute mit zugehörigen Solarpanelen zu konstruieren. Macht absolut Laune damit zu planen, dann zu bauen. Absoluter Dank an die Entwickler.

It is not possible to save or export anything.
Something is wrong with this compilation.
Versions before did work, but this one is buggy.
No problems with version 2.3
Ich habe versucht eine Grundfläche (zum Extrudieren) gezeichnet und mit kläglich daran gescheitert, die Abmessungen in mm zu bestimmen!
Acabo de instalarlo, habrá que probar para dar una opinión. Lo que veo es que guarda en un formato .slvs (no se si hay algún soft compatible, por si este falla)
Con Inkscape puedes abrir el prorama y guardarlo como DXF

Una forma rapida de entrar en el 3D parametrico. Hay que darle unas horas de entrenamiento para hacer lo que uno quiere, y otras tantas para resolver problemas. Es para usuarios con ganas de experimentar y que no se asustan por el primer problema que surja..

Le meilleur outils de modélisation 3D si on prend en compte la légèreté, la simplicité d'utilisation et les formats de sortie. La prise en main est très rapide, il est possible de revenir sur les modifications antérieures très simplement. Il est vraiment au top ce (petit) outil.

J'ai été enthousiasmé par ce logiciel depuis plusieurs mois pour son ergonomie et sa puissance de réalisation.
Cependant j'ai noté un comportement en régression:
* la création d'un rectangle donne maintenant des côtés avec des dimensions impossibles à modifier avec "Dimension" ?!? les cotés sont marqués comme REF. impossible de trouver les raisons des contraintes

enfin dans le cas de contraintes en collision, nous ne disposons pas de retour du logiciel sur leur identification pour nous aider à trouver une solution.
Сохранял в Компасе фрагмент под расширением DXF, при импортировании все превратилось в каляку-муляку...
Писал статью по теме тело вращения, сравнивал различные САПР, SolveSpace самая простая и удобная для этого!
